snippet: The styles of the two investors could not be more different. But Jeffrey Goldfarb of Reuters Breakingviews notes that both men beat the market by betting on America, playing hardball and trading on personal brands.
abstract: The styles of the two investors could not be more different. But Jeffrey Goldfarb of Reuters Breakingviews notes that both men beat the market by betting on America, playing hardball and trading on personal brands.

headline.main: Buffett and Icahn: Birds of a Feather?

snippet: The Rocket and the Jack Frost, two iceboats built in the late 1800s that have been restored, took to the frozen Hudson River on Saturday.
abstract: Members of the North Shrewsbury Ice Boat and Yacht Club and Hudson River Ice Yacht Club sail the Rocket and the Jack Frost, two iceboats built in late 1800s that have been restored, on the frozen Hudson River.

snippet: The sector’s growth is intensifying competition for deposits and putting pressure on state-run banks, which are struggling with a severe cash squeeze.
abstract: Growth in China's Internet banking sector is intensifying competition for bank deposits and aggressive interest rates; puts pressure on state-run banks, which are struggling with severe cash squeeze.

headline.main: High-Interest Web Banks on the Rise in China

snippet: For new tech companies, developing features and acquiring users tends to be a priority over securing customer data, leaving them vulnerable to security breaches.
abstract: Many new tech companies are neglecting data security, instead focusing on developing features and acquiring users; placing development and growth as priority over securing customer data is leaving them vulnerable to security breaches.

headline.main: When Start-Ups Don’t Lock the Doors
